ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then he drew near and hung suspended.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he drew near and drew closer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he drew near and hung above suspended,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He (Gabriel) then came nearer and nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then the Spectacle became closer, and came down in full view.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he approached and came closer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he drew near, then he bowed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then drew near and suspended hung,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then he drew nigh and came down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thereafter he drew nigh, then he let himself down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he drew nearer and nearer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then he approached and came closer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he [Jibrael (Gabriel)] approached and came closer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then he drew near, and became close
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he came near, and hovered around.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:8] Then he drew near, he came close to him, and drew closer still,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then he drew nigh) Gabriel drew near Muhammad (pbuh); and it is said: Muhammad (pbuh) drew near to his Lord (and came down) closer,
